name: 威廉·吉尔伯特
bio_short: 英国皇家医师和物理学家，被誉为“实验科学之父”。他发表了《论磁石》，证明了地球是一块巨大的磁铁，并首次区分了电与磁。
bio_short_en: An English royal physician and physicist, known as the 'father of experimental science'. He published 'De Magnete', proved the Earth is a giant magnet, and was the first to distinguish electricity from magnetism.
